p: Fortunately, unlike previous epidemics of SARS, identification of the infection and the virus itself has been rapid. The prompt response and massive organisation of the Chinese health system have limited its spread. Nevertheless, a large number of cases and the daily increases in cases suggest that we are facing a very contagious strain.
